title: A Cat, a Coward, and Female Genitalia
description:
Bob Garfield and Mike Vuolo discuss the etymological quirkiness of the word "pussy."  Lexicon Valley is brought to you by The Message, a new podcast series from GE Podcast Theater.  Join Slate Plus! Members get bonus segments, exclusive member-only podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at www.slate.com/podcastsplus.
